S3 Home[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2025-12-11T17:47:51+00:00

# Security. Sustainability. Stewardship.

Hassle-free e-waste solutions for businesses

## E-Recycling Made Easy

S3 Recycling Solutions is the right choice for businesses in need of an easy, hassle-free way to responsibly manage excess electronics. S3’s Springfield, Tenn. facility is R2-certified, and we offer on-site pickups across the country. We also provide customers with the peace of mind that data security is maintained at the highest industry standards. The S3 team handles the entire process of sorting, selling, recycling and/or donating surplus items based on clients’ needs, as well as any special requests. [Contact S3](https://s3rs.com/contact-us/) today to get started on your e-waste solution.

Pickup Request

## Testimonials

A word from our clients about our services:

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%27350%27%20height%3D%27367%27%20viewBox%3D%270%200%20350%20367%27%3E%3Crect%20width%3D%27350%27%20height%3D%27367%27%20fill-opacity%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E)

> Our partnership with S3 helps us to be good stewards of the environment and maximize our organizational efficiency as we process our surplus equipment.

College University

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%27350%27%20height%3D%27367%27%20viewBox%3D%270%200%20350%20367%27%3E%3Crect%20width%3D%27350%27%20height%3D%27367%27%20fill-opacity%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E)

> S3’s customer service, ease of use, and account management are far superior to other recycling vendors we have partnered with in the past. All S3 personnel we have worked with have been kind and professional, making their pickups quick and easy. Their reporting resources are easy to use and provide thorough documented record of all equipment recycled and all data destroyed.

Financial Institution

#### [S3 Exec Named a Top Impact CEO](https://s3rs.com/2026/01/s3-exec-named-top-impact-ceo/)

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2026-01-16T17:09:03+00:00January 16th, 2026\|[0 Comments](https://s3rs.com/2026/01/s3-exec-named-top-impact-ceo/#respond)

Rod McDaniel is among CEOs around the country who are recognized for leadership, vision, and influence.

- [![](https://s3rs.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/2025-2-700x441.jpg)](https://s3rs.com/2025/08/s3-ranks-on-the-2025-inc-list/)

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2025-08-12T12:59:12+00:00

#### [S3 Ranks on the 2025 INC List](https://s3rs.com/2025/08/s3-ranks-on-the-2025-inc-list/)

[s3rs2021](https://s3rs.com/author/s3rs2021/ "Posts by s3rs2021")2025-08-12T12:59:12+00:00August 12th, 2025\|Comments Off on S3 Ranks on the 2025 INC List

With three-year revenue growth of 145 Percent, S3 Recycling Solutions ranks among America’s fastest-growing private companies.
